snippet: Damascus’s Old City has been largely unscathed by war, but a New Jersey man raised there is helping arm and organize militias to protect the historic district.
abstract: Rafiq Lotof, New Jersey man raised in Syria, is working with Syrian government to arm and organize new militias in Old City of Damascus in order to protect historic district; supporters believe militias prevent attacks, kidnappings and infiltration by rebels, but some residents fear they are creating military target inside Old City's bubble of relative security, and projecting new threat to those who dissent.
lead_paragraph: Damascus’s Old City has been largely unscathed by war, but a New Jersey man raised there is helping arm and organize militias to protect the historic district.

headline.main: Enlisting Damascus Residents to Answer Assad’s Call
headline.print_headline: Enlisting Damascus Residents to Answer Assad’s Call
